name: Mini ESG Bench Dataset
description: This dataset is meant to be a difficult benchmark for pdf parsers. In particular, adopting the terminology used in the PDFTiage paper (https://arxiv.org/abs/2309.08872), we curate difficult questions involving structural knowledge of the PDF documents. The examples in this dataset come from the Environment, Social and (corporate) Governance (ESG) reports of FAANG + Microsoft in 2021-2022.
